reviewHighlights.text: If you buy the complete pack, you get the new version and the legacy version with its expansions. I recommend the new version, but either one is fine....
This expansion adds some more campaign content. I personally enjoyed the storyline but it was definitely not as long as the Opposing Fronts expansion....
